user_query: Examine how the shift to remote work environments has influenced productivity, team dynamics, and company culture in various industries.

1.panel_description: Provide an introduction to remote work, including trends, historical context, and the importance of studying its impact.

1.handles: Provides an introduction to remote work.

input_vars.name: remote_work_intro_query
input_vars.description: Query to gather information on remote work trends, historical context, and importance.
input_vars.value: Provide an overview of remote work trends, historical context, and the importance of studying the impact of remote work.

output_vars.name: remote_work_intro
output_vars.description: Introduction to remote work, including trends, historical context, and importance.

2.panel_description: Explore how remote work has influenced productivity, with a focus on measuring productivity, comparative analysis, and factors affecting productivity.

1.handles: Gathers data on productivity in remote settings.

input_vars.name: productivity_query
input_vars.description: Query to gather data on productivity in remote settings.
input_vars.value: Explore how remote work has influenced productivity, including measuring productivity, comparative analysis, and factors affecting productivity.

output_vars.name: productivity_data
output_vars.description: Data on productivity in remote settings.

input_vars.name: productivity_data
input_vars.description: Raw output of productivity_data from previous step. Please provide raw output.

input_vars.name: panel_num_2
input_vars.description: Panel number goes to the index parameter.

input_vars.name: visualization_query
input_vars.description: Query specifying the type of visualization. We will combine all context from the previous panel steps as it is without shortening.
input_vars.value: Create a bar chart comparing productivity levels in remote and on-site work settings.

output_vars.name: productivity_visualization
output_vars.description: Visualization of productivity data in remote settings.

3.panel_description: Examine the impact of remote work on team dynamics, focusing on communication, collaboration, and trust.

1.handles: Gathers information on team dynamics in remote settings.

input_vars.name: team_dynamics_query
input_vars.description: Query to gather information on team dynamics in remote settings.
input_vars.value: Examine the impact of remote work on team dynamics, including communication, collaboration, and trust.

output_vars.name: team_dynamics_impact
output_vars.description: Impact of remote work on team dynamics.

4.panel_description: Analyze how remote work influences company culture, focusing on defining culture, maintaining it, and employee engagement.

1.handles: Gathers information on company culture in remote settings.

input_vars.name: culture_query
input_vars.description: Query to gather information on company culture in remote settings.
input_vars.value: Analyze how remote work influences company culture, including defining culture, maintaining it, and employee engagement.

output_vars.name: culture_data
output_vars.description: Information on company culture in remote settings.

2.handles: Visualizes survey data on employee engagement.

input_vars.name: culture_data
input_vars.description: Raw output of culture_data from previous step. Please provide raw output.

input_vars.name: panel_num_4
input_vars.description: Panel number goes to the index parameter.

input_vars.name: visualization_query
input_vars.description: Query specifying the type of visualization. We will combine all context from the previous panel steps as it is without shortening.
input_vars.value: Create a pie chart showing employee engagement levels in remote work settings.

output_vars.name: culture_visualization
output_vars.description: Visualization of survey data on employee engagement.

5.panel_description: Cover the technological infrastructure necessary for remote work, focusing on essential technologies and cybersecurity challenges.

1.handles: Gathers information on technological infrastructure for remote work.

input_vars.name: tech_infrastructure_query
input_vars.description: Query to gather information on technological infrastructure for remote work.
input_vars.value: Cover the technological infrastructure necessary for remote work, including essential technologies and cybersecurity challenges.

output_vars.name: tech_infrastructure
output_vars.description: Information on technological infrastructure for remote work.

6.panel_description: Explore the impact of remote work on specific industries, providing case studies and examples.

1.handles: Gathers information on industry-specific impacts of remote work.

input_vars.name: industry_impacts_query
input_vars.description: Query to gather information on industry-specific impacts of remote work.
input_vars.value: Explore the impact of remote work on specific industries, including case studies and examples.

output_vars.name: industry_impacts
output_vars.description: Information on industry-specific impacts of remote work.

7.panel_description: Analyze the economic implications of remote work, focusing on cost-benefit analysis and impact on economies.

1.handles: Gathers information on economic implications of remote work.

input_vars.name: economic_implications_query
input_vars.description: Query to gather information on economic implications of remote work.
input_vars.value: Analyze the economic implications of remote work, including cost-benefit analysis and impact on economies.

output_vars.name: economic_implications
output_vars.description: Information on economic implications of remote work.

8.panel_description: Examine the psychological and social aspects of remote work, focusing on mental health and social isolation.

1.handles: Gathers information on psychological and social aspects of remote work.

input_vars.name: psychological_social_query
input_vars.description: Query to gather information on psychological and social aspects of remote work.
input_vars.value: Examine the psychological and social aspects of remote work, including mental health and social isolation.

output_vars.name: psychological_social_impact
output_vars.description: Information on psychological and social aspects of remote work.

9.panel_description: Explore future trends and predictions for remote work, focusing on trends, predictions, and policy considerations.

1.handles: Gathers information on future trends and predictions for remote work.

input_vars.name: future_remote_work_query
input_vars.description: Query to gather information on future trends and predictions for remote work.
input_vars.value: Explore future trends and predictions for remote work, including trends, predictions, and policy considerations.

output_vars.name: future_remote_work
output_vars.description: Information on future trends and predictions for remote work.
